Hydra Skin Armor

armor (lvl 6)

item id [id]: 236
armor id [armor]: 43 (Hydra Skin Armor)
protection, body [protbody]: 12
defence [def]: -1
encumbrance [enc]: 1
limited regeneration [limitedregeneration]: 10%
resist poison [poisonres]: +15
national discount [nationrebate]: #9 EA Sauromatia - Amazon Queens
#46 MA Pythium - Emerald Empire

Requires 10N to forge (N2)

This armor is made from the skin of a hydra. It grants the wearer the regenerative powers of the hydra and protects its wearer from poison.
